languages.text: "Да благословит тебя Великий, шерин! Всегда знала, что ты из нормальных ребят, без гнильцы. Пусть и со странностями". {n}Джай заходится очередным приступом кашля и сплевывает багровый сгусток под ноги.{/n} "Тьфу, ажи бы меня побрали! Надо пошевеливать задницей, пока я еще в состоянии ее за собой носить".

"May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."
languages.original_text: "Да благословит тебя Великий, шерин! Всегда знала, что ты из нормальных ребят, без гнильцы. Пусть и со странностями". {n}Джай заходится очередным приступом кашля и сплевывает багровый сгусток под ноги.{/n} "Тьфу, ажи бы меня побрали! Надо пошевеливать задницей, пока я еще в состоянии ее за собой носить".

traits.locale_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I have always known you as one of the good ones, not rotten inside. Quirky, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted gob.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの祝福が降り注ぐことを祈るわ、シャリーン！あんたの心は腐ってない。ちょっと変わり者だけど、いい人だってことをあたしは知ってる。変わり者ではあるけどね」{n}ジェイはまた前かがみになって咳き込み、真紅に染まった塊を吐き出した。{/n}「あー、アジーよ助けてちょうだい！動けるうちに動かなきゃならないね」
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの祝福が降り注ぐことを祈るわ、シャリーン！あんたの心は腐ってない。ちょっと変わり者だけど、いい人だってことをあたしは知ってる。変わり者ではあるけどね」{n}ジェイはまた前かがみになって咳き込み、真紅に染まった塊を吐き出した。{/n}「あー、アジーよ助けてちょうだい！動けるうちに動かなきゃならないね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇祝福你，亲爱的！我早就知道你是个好人，不是那种烂人。虽然性格有点怪，但人一点都不坏。”{n}婕伊再次咳嗽起来，弯下腰，吐出一口深红色的血块。{/n}“啊，愿鬼怪带走我吧！我得趁还没咽气的时候赶紧挪腾起来。”
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇祝福你，亲爱的！我早就知道你是个好人，不是那种烂人。虽然有点怪，但一点都不坏。”{n}婕伊再次咳嗽起来，弯下腰，吐出一口深红色的血痰。{/n}“啊，愿鬼怪带走我吧！我得趁还没咽气的时候赶紧挪腾起来。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado l{mf|e|a} colme de bendiciones, shereen! Siempre he sabido que era buena persona; que no estaba podrid{mf|o|a} por dentro. Diferente sí, pero no podrid{mf|o|a}». {n}Otro ataque de tos hace que Jae se doble y escupa una flema carmesí.{/n} «Uf, ¡que los azhi me lleven! Debería mover el culo mientras siga pudiendo».
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado l{mf|e|a} colme de bendiciones, shereen! Siempre he sabido que era buena gente; que no estaba podrid{mf|o|a} por dentro. Peculiar, pero no podrid{mf|o|a}». {n}Otro ataque de tos hace que Jae se doble y escupa un esputo carmesí.{/n} «Uf, ¡que los azhi me lleven! Debería mover el culo mientras siga pudiendo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Möge der Erhabene mit Euch Segnungen überschütten, Shereen! Ich wusste immer, Ihr seid anständig und nicht innerlich verdorben. Außergewöhnlich ja, aber nicht verdorben." {n}Jae krümmt sich ob eines neuen Hustenanfalls und spuckt einen roten Klumpen aus.{/n} "Argh, die Azhi sollen mich holen! Ich sollte meinen Arsch bewegen, so lange ich ihn noch tragen kann."
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Erhabene mit Euch Segnungen überschütten, Shereen! Ich wusste schon immer, Ihr gehört zu den Guten, seid nicht von innen verfault. Sonderlich, aber nicht verfault." {n}Jae krümmt sich ob eines neuen Hustenanfalls und spuckt einen roten Schleimpropf aus.{/n} "Argh, die Azhi sollen mich holen! Ich sollte meinen Arsch bewegen, so lange ich ihn noch tragen kann."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Que l'Exalté vous bénisse, shereen ! J'ai toujours su que vous faisiez pas partie des pourris. Excentrique, ça, oui, mais {mf|pourri|pourrie}. » {n}Prise d'une nouvelle quinte de toux, Jae se penche en avant et éructe un caillot teinté d'écarlate.{/n} « Argh, que les azhis m'emportent ! Je devrais me bouger le cul tant que je le peux encore. »
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Exalté vous bénisse, shereen ! J'ai toujours su que vous faisiez pas partie des pourris. Excentrique, ça, oui. Mais {mf|pourri|pourrie}, non. » {n}Prise d'une nouvelle quinte de toux, Jae se penche en avant et éructe un crachat teinté de sang.{/n} « Argh, que les azhi m'emportent ! Je devrais me bouger le cul tant que je le peux encore. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Görkemli seni lütufla bezesin şirinim! İçi kokuşmuşlardan olmadığını, düzgün birisi olduğunu hep biliyordum. Biraz tuhafsın ama kokuşmamışsın." {n}Bir öksürük nöbetine daha tutulan Jae, kızıla boyanmış bir parça pıhtı tükürüyor.{/n} "Öf, azhi alsın canımı! Hâlâ kıçımı kaldırabiliyorken harekete geçsem iyi olacak."
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One shower you with blessings, shereen! I always knew you were a decent sort, not rotten inside. A bit out-there, but not rotten." {n}Jae bends over in yet another coughing fit and spits out a crimson-tinted clot.{/n} "Ugh, azhi take me! I should move my arse while I can still carry it around."

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli seni lütufla bezesin şirinim! İçi kokuşmuşlardan biri değil de düzgün birisi olduğunun hep farkındaydım. Biraz tuhafsın ama kokuşmamışsın." {n}Bir öksürük nöbetine daha tutulan Jae, kızıla boyanmış bir parça pıhtı tükürüyor.{/n} "Öf, azhi alsın canımı! Hâlâ kıçımı kaldırabiliyorken harekete geçsem iyi olacak."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
